coza.opencollab.synthesis.push.service

Interface PushService


  • public interface PushService
    Interface for sending and persisting Push messages to Device. Implementations of this service will typically persist Push messages from a database, retrieve devices from a service, and send the message to the devices using an implementation of the SendService interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int countPushes()
      Returns the number of Push messages persisted.
      List<Push> findAllPush()
      Returns a list of ALL the Push messages that are persisted.
      WARNING: This method can return A LOT of data
      List<Device> findDevicesForPush(Push push)
      Finds a list of Devices that was linked to a Push.
      Push findPushById(Long id)
      Finds a Push by its ID.
      void queuePush(Push push, Collection<Device> Devices)
      Queues a push to many devices to be sent.
      void queuePush(Push push, Device device)
      Adds a push for a single device to the queue.
      void removePush(Long pushId)
      Removes a Push message.
      Push savePush(Push push)
      Persists a Push message.
      void sheduleToolChangePush(ManagedModule module, Tool tool)
      Schedule an outgoing push notification for a tool that changed.

      • queuePush

        void queuePush(Push push,
             Collection<Device> Devices)
        Queues a push to many devices to be sent.
        Parameters:
        push - Push message to be sent.
        Devices - Devices the Push message should be sent to.

      • sheduleToolChangePush

        void sheduleToolChangePush(ManagedModule module,
                         Tool tool)
        Schedule an outgoing push notification for a tool that changed.
        Parameters:
        module - the module
        tool - the tool

      • queuePush

        void queuePush(Push push,
             Device device)
        Adds a push for a single device to the queue. This function should only be used for single (test) messages. When sending messages in bulk, it should rather be run in a separate Thread and tuples should be saved using the PushDeviceTupleService
        Parameters:
        push - Push message to send
        device - Device to send the message to

      • countPushes

        int countPushes()
        Returns the number of Push messages persisted.
        Returns:
        number of Push messages persisted.

      • findPushById

        Push findPushById(Long id)
        Finds a Push by its ID.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the Push to find.
        Returns:
        The Push that has the specified ID.

      • findAllPush

        List<Push> findAllPush()
        Returns a list of ALL the Push messages that are persisted.
        WARNING: This method can return A LOT of data
        Returns:
        A list of all the persisted Push messages.

      • findDevicesForPush

        List<Device> findDevicesForPush(Push push)
        Finds a list of Devices that was linked to a Push.
        Parameters:
        push - Push to find devices of.
        Returns:
        List of Devices that was linked.
